about_the_game:
Darkwoulfe's Token Pack volume 16


Created by Riley D. Owens (aka Darkwoulfe), this product consists of 25 top-down uniquely designed, 3d rendered tokens, depicting heroes, villains and monsters. You can use these to replace the letter tokens or built-in tokens in many popular adventure modules. Just unlock the encounters and drag these over top or drag them over top of the listing in your combat tracker.

This Token Pack includes:

  • Space Anti-Paladin with Energy Staff
  • Space Chameleonoid Aiming1
  • Space Chameleonoid Firing
  • Space Chameleonoid Patrolman
  • Space Defense Regular Aiming
  • Space Defense Regular Guarding
  • Space Defense Regular with Rifle
  • Space Defense Regular
  • Space Force Black Ops Soldier Firing Crouched
  • Space Force Black Ops Soldier Firing
  • Space Force Black Ops Soldier with Rifle
  • Space Force Black Ops Soldier
  • Space Force Commander
  • Space Force Elite Unit with Energy SMG Firing
  • Space Force Elite Unite with Energy SMG Firing
  • Space Force Vehicle Operator Firing
  • Space Gunslinger
  • Space Horned Pirate
  • Space Jetcar
  • Space Paladin Dual Wielder
  • Space Pirate Firing
  • Space Planetary Defense Force Regular Firing
  • Space Planetary Defense Force Regular
  • Space Pufferfishanoid with pistol
  • Space Rogue with Pistol

Requires: An active subscription or a Fantasy Grounds full or ultimate license and any Ruleset.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.

  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
